title: PaintAlbum [Coding available][H33T][superl]
description:
PaintAlbum Version 1.0.0

Description:

PaintAlbum is a paint bucket coloring program. You can load any kind of picture format:
	   ".bmp",
            ".emf",
            ".gif",
            ".jpg",
            ".png",
            ".tiff",
            ".wmf",
	   ".ico"

Plus you can use any size of picture you want. To add more pictures to the collection just copy your images to "C:Program FilesLuJoSoftPaintAlbumDessins" then when you open the program the next time they will auto load in it ready for your use.

The other option you have is to save your finish product to file just by selecting save as, and you can print your finish product with the print button to any printer or pdf. You have the choice of over 16 millions colors by using the predefine one or by the track bar in the color group.

The tolerance group is just a controls track bar for the flood fill sensitivity usually the default value are good for most case.

Installation:

Just double click "PaintAlbum setup.exe" then this will install the program in the Wright directory plus install shortcut on desktop and start -> All programs -> LuJoSoft -> PaintAlbum .

To use the program just double click any shortcut.

Help is available at http://www.lujosoft.net/Forum/ . Just post any question you might have and you will get a quick reply.

Code available at [url]http://www.lujosoft.net/Forum/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=150[/url]
